column4: execute store result block ~ ~ ~ auto byte 0 run tag @e[type=item,nbt={Item:{tag:{cmd:{pos:[2.5d,1.5d,8.5d]}}}}] add flag_i1
execute positioned as @e[type=item,tag=flag_i1] run tag @e[type=item,distance=0.01..5] add flag_i2
execute as @e[type=item,tag=flag_i2] positioned as @s align xyz run tp @s ~0.5 ~0.5 ~1.5
execute as @e[type=item,tag=flag_i2] run data modify entity @s Item.tag.cmd.pos set from entity @s Pos
execute as @e[type=item,tag=flag_i2] run data modify entity @s Item.tag.cmd.enabled set value 1b
execute unless entity @e[type=item,tag=flag_i2] run say failed
